Hamzah Bazie


He was born on the 8th of June, 2002 at Bondai, a suburb within the Prestea-Huni Valley Municipality. His father is.

Career

He had his basic education at New Atuabo Community Basic School (NATUCOBS).

He is a member of the Islamic Golden Eleven where he mostly feature as a left back.

He likes to engage in photography at his leisure time.
